title: AB InBev
summary:
Anheuser-Busch InBev SA/NV, commonly known as AB InBev, is a multinational drink and brewing company based in Leuven, Belgium.[2][3][4][5]  
AB InBev has a global functional management office in New York City, and regional headquarters in SÃ£o Paulo, London, St. Louis, Mexico City, Bremen, Johannesburg and others.[6] It has approximately 630 beer brands in 150 countries.[1]
